Name: Relapse
About the game: Player's Turn: Player goes first. Draw cards that each represent an ability, use them as long as you have the action points to cast them, then ready up the battle phase when you're done. Battle Phase: The battle phase is where the AI executes their abilities. You'll always know what actions your companions are going to do, but only an idea of what the enemy is up to. Hope you planned accordingly! Unlockables: Over 170+ cosmetic skins, familiars, starting abilities and starting trinkets to unlock! Companions: You're not alone! Summon creatures to aid you in your crusade! Environmental Hazards: The world around you changes as you reach new destinations on the map, influencing you to change course. Will you be greedy, or play it safe? Victory: Each battle, earn experience towards a chosen class, level up, claim some loot, gain new abilities! Features: 240+ cards you can use during any run 5 decks, each specialized in different areas 5 classes to level up, unlocking newer cards as you progress Level cards to make them stronger, each having 3 levels Cards can be enchanted, adding completely different abilities to it 100+ trinkets to find 90 enemies 15+ companions to aid you during your crusade 170+ cosmetics to unlock Talents - Permanent upgrades 3 acts to complete, with each node's content procedurally generated The world map has environmental events that trigger each time you move, influencing your next choice to path towards Negative effects persists between battles Story: Mankind, cursed to forever live through their destruction, only to have time reset once they've all been killed with no memory of what happened. You play as Realm, a simple peasant, who's goal is to lift the curse. Only you remember what happened between each reset. Learn, adapt, slay beasts, find loot, die, rinse and repeat! Solo Developer: Made by one dude! Join the discord, ask me anything, leave me suggestions and feedback!
